name: Travel 2 Space
description:
Hello!

This is game is for Devtober 2021 and Indieapocalypse Issue#23.

I really want to thank Ellian for making Devtober, It really made me work like I am following a schedule, I learned a lot of stuff this october.

I want to try and submit this indieapocalypse hoping to get feedback or even get selected :).

This game is inspired by Subway Surfers, you will launch into space avoid obstacles and battle bosses, but the catch is you will be controlling 2 ships, do you have what it takes to control them?

Credits:
